analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na dassanena pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo
analyzed: dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ

original: ca nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Dassanena
analyzed: ca na neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā dassanena

original: pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo ca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā
analyzed: pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na dassanena pahātabbaḥ ca na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ ca dhammā

original: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca

original: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na dassanena pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Dassanena pahātabbañca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: dassanena pahātabbañca na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbañca dhammam paṭicca na dassanena pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Bhāvanāya pahātabbañca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: bhāvanāya pahātabbañca na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbañca dhammam paṭicca na dassanena pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā ekūnavīsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate ekūnavīsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnavīsa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate ekūnavīsa
sahajāta vārampi pe sampayutta vārampi pañhā vārampi
